params.note: Cell-type labels were assigned using the CellWalker method as implemented in CellWalkR (v0.1.7).
CellWalker integrated scRNA-seq derived labels with scATAC-seq data by building a network of label-to-cell and cell-to-cell edges.
Cell-to-cell edge weights were calculated using Jaccard similarity between cells.
Label-to-cell weights were calculated as the sum of the products of gene activity scores and log fold-change in expression of each marker for that cell label.
Label edge weights were tuned using cell homogeneity as described in reference 17.
Diffusion over the network produced a vector of influence scores for each label per cell.
Influence score vectors were smoothed by taking a weighted average with the ten closest neighbors in UMAP space, where each neighbor contributed one-fifth as much as the cell itself.
Final cell-type labels were assigned based on the label with the highest influence score for each cell.
